mapper.select: SELECT s.study_no, s.member_no, (SELECT m.username FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = s.member_no) AS leaderName, s.title, s.intake, s.method, s.recruitment_deadline, s.created_date, s.hit_count, s.like_count, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t.name) AS tags FROM study s LEFT OUTER JOIN study_tag_stat sts ON s.study_no = sts.study_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t ON sts.tag_no = t.tag_no GROUP BY s.study_no ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize};

SELECT s.study_no, s.member_no, (SELECT m.username FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = s.member_no) AS leaderName, s.title, s.intake, s.introduction, s.location, s.method, s.recruitment_deadline, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.stat, s.hit_count, s.like_count, t.tag_no, t.name FROM study s LEFT OUTER JOIN study_tag_stat sts ON s.study_no = sts.study_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t ON sts.tag_no=t.tag_no WHERE s.study_no=#{studyNo} ORDER BY study_no DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET title=#{title}, method=#{method}, intake=#{intake}, recruitment_deadline=#{recruitmentDeadline}, introduction=#{introduction} WHERE study_no=#{studyNo};
UPDATE study SET hit_count = hit_count + 1 WHERE study_no=#{studyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_study_stat(member_no, study_no, stat, apply_msg) VALUES(#{memberDto.memberNo}, #{studyDto.studyNo}, 'S03-104', #{applyMsg})

SELECT s.study_no, s.member_no, s.title, s.intake, s.method, s.recruitment_deadline, t.tag_no, t.name FROM study s LEFT OUTER JOIN study_tag_stat sts ON s.study_no = sts.study_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tag t ON sts.tag_no=t.tag_no WHERE s.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY s.study_no DESC;
